name: Alter of the dogs
description:
to start, move the player into the "start"

CONTROLS:

w,a,s,d or arrow keys to move

space to shoot

left click to place blocks and interact with the armory, miners, and loggers

right click to break blocks and trees 

move the mouse to aim

z to fly with wings

click the "?" for crafting controls

CRAFTING: (press the q,e,r,t,y,u,i keys to craft)

wood cutter;Q; gives you wood

furnace;E; gives you iron

gem lab;R; gives you gems

armory;T;  click to get extra health

wings;Y; make you fly

loggers;U;/miners;I; click to hire miners or loggers

STORY:

a dog bed randomly spawned and its sommoning zomified dogs. Do you have the guts to save the world?

this is my  first game so its really bad. I  hope to improve my games the more I code.
